Posts.Content: Hi Ladies Hoping someone can help, I was diagnosed October last year, chemo, lumpectomies etc, cold capped throughout get my hair, just been prescribed Letrozole, been on it 3 weeks and my hair is thinning big time.  The brand is Accord I think.  Does anyone know if any brands have different effect I am devasted.
Posts.Title: Letrozole Brands and side effects
